You can run Custos purely using
For this simply put this text into a file named

services:
  custos:
    image: glitchdevx/custos:latest
    restart: always
    ports:
      - "127.0.0.1:3060:3060"
  custos-ui:
    image: glitchdevx/custos-ui:latest
    restart: always
    depends_on:
      - custos
    ports:
      - "127.0.0.1:3070:80"
If you want to run Custos headless simply remove the custos-ui part of the file.
To manage Custos you need to enter the directory the
is short for detach, and will result in the container running in the background.
If you start Custos using docker compose it will stay running even after restarts.
To update Custos, you need to pull the newest image by running:
docker compose down && docker compose up -d
